product_name: Sawyer Premium ULTRA 30 Insect Repellent Lotion - 30 Percent DEET - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Sawyer Premium ULTRA 30 Insect Repellent lotion provides lasting protection against mosquitoes, biting flies, chiggers, ticks, fleas and gnats. Liposome-based repellent allows for a controlled release of the 30% DEET solution thereby extending the effectiveness for up to 11 hrs. Lotion resists perspiration and is nongreasy and odorless. Bottle is sized to meet airline carry-on restrictions.
short_description: Sawyer Premium ULTRA 30 Insect Repellent lotion provides lasting protection against mosquitoes, biting flies, chiggers, ticks, fleas and gnats.
